article_title: 14 Things You Could Buy Instead Of Kim Kardashian's Face
article_text: WASHINGTON -- This week, socialite Kim Kardashian detailed her makeup routine, listing products with a total cost of at least $1,977.75, according to an investigative report by Jezebel. That got the HuffPost Politics team thinking about the many political items a person could buy instead of investing in the products that create the mirage known as "Kim Kardashian's face."
